title: TranscriptionPage (v2)
description: Represents the complete, structured transcription of a single journal page, enhanced to capture writing styles, decorations, and graphical elements.

page_number.title: Page Number
page_number.description: The sequential number of the page in the journal. Use 0 for the cover/front matter.

image_source.title: Image Source
image_source.description: The filename or URL of the source page image.

lines.title: Lines
lines.description: An ordered array of transcribed text lines found on the page.

graphical_elements.title: Graphical Elements
graphical_elements.description: An array of non-textual graphical elements on the page.

BoundingBox.title: BoundingBox
BoundingBox.description: The coordinates of a rectangular box, with the origin (0,0) at the top-left corner of the page.

WordStatus.title: WordStatus
WordStatus.description: The confidence status of the transcription for a single word.

WritingStyle.title: WritingStyle
WritingStyle.description: The style of writing for a given word.

TextDecoration.title: TextDecoration
TextDecoration.description: Describes visual decorations applied to a word.

is_insertion.description: True if this word was inserted above or below the main line of text.

notes.description: Note for complex decorations, e.g., 'Scribble underline.' or 'Inserted above ''FIVE'''.

text.title: Text
text.description: The transcribed text of the word. For illegible words, this should be '[illegible]'.

confidence.title: Confidence
confidence.description: The model's confidence in the accuracy of the transcription, from 0.0 (uncertain) to 1.0 (certain).

alternatives.title: Alternatives
alternatives.description: An optional list of alternative transcriptions, used for hypothesized or low-confidence words.

line_id.title: Line ID
line_id.description: A unique identifier for the line within the page (e.g., 'line-1', 'line-2').

words.title: Words
words.description: An ordered array of the words transcribed on this line.

GraphicalElement.title: GraphicalElement
GraphicalElement.description: A non-textual element on the page.

description.description: A brief description of the element.
